result.title: Sessions #14&#15 â€” Computational Geometry (Circle Operations, Polygons)
result.content:
AlSalam Allaikum All,

During these sessions we have discussed various problems in Computation Geometry, including circles and polygons.

Resources for this session exist through the following:

  • Coach Mohammad Kotb (mohammadkotb) Youtube Channel, you can check the second and third videos.
  • The notes distributed during the first geometry session, if you don't have a copy, you can view it here

Problem set for the session will be available through a2oj contest here.
